title: How interesting is btech in computer science from IIT? - Quora
tags: Computer Science Education at Indian Institutes of Technology
Indian Institutes of Technology Bachelor of Technology Degrees

response.answer_text: Whether a subject at any institute/university is interesting depends on 2 things: (1) Your own inerest/passion about that ubject (Computer Sc., in your case) (2) The faculty (qualifications, background, experience, resarch activities, no. of papers published in high-impact factor journals, etc.), facilities and resources and reputation of that institute/university. On point#1, it depends on you On point#2, B.Tech. in Comp.Sc. from IITs, specially from IITs at Kanpur/Bombay/Madras/Delhi, are the best in India at undergraduate level, so there is no confusion regarding this point!
